casebody.data:
[Rockingham,

December, 1881.] Toppan v. Eastern Railroad Co. Marston ¿- Bastman, for the plaintiff. J. Batch, for the defendants.

Case. Pacts found by a referee whose report for the plaintiff was based on the defendants’ negligence found as a fact.

Judgment for the plaintiff.

Smith, J., did not sit: the others concurred.
